titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize certain disabled former prisoners of war to use Department of Defense commissary and exchange stores.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S69)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
1/6/2009--Introduced.
Authorizes use of Department of Defense commissary and exchange stores by former prisoners of war who have been honorably separated from service and have a service-connected disability rated at 30% or more.
